20110119085254.000|20110119085257.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20110119085257.000|20110119085257.000|CC1|           so you can

20110119085259.000|20110119085259.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20110119085259.000|20110119085302.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20110119085302.000|20110119085304.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20110119085304.000|20110119085304.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20110119085304.000|20110119085307.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20110119085307.000|20110119085307.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20110119085307.000|20110119085309.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20110119085309.000|20110119085311.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20110119085311.000|20110119085311.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20110119085311.000|20110119085313.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20110119085313.000|20110119085315.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.  
20110119085315.000|20110119085315.000|CC1|     In depressed patients,     
20110119085315.000|20110119085317.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20110119085317.000|20110119085317.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20110119085317.000|20110119085319.000|CC1|           may occur.           
20110119085319.000|20110119085319.000|CC1|           Alcohol may          
20110119085319.000|20110119085321.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20110119085321.000|20110119085321.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20110119085321.000|20110119085323.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20110119085323.000|20110119085325.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20110119085325.000|20110119085325.000|CC1|    Side effects may include    
20110119085325.000|20110119085328.000|CC1|   unpleasant taste, headache,  
20110119085328.000|20110119085328.000|CC1|            dizziness           
20110119085328.000|20110119085330.000|CC1|     and morning drowsiness.    
20110119085330.000|20110119085330.000|CC1|   Ask your doctor if Lunesta   
20110119085330.000|20110119085333.000|CC1|        is right for you.
